lead_paragraph: The mobile-payments company posted strong revenue growth, while Twitter, his other company, is struggling to attract new users.

headline.print_headline: If Dorsey Has a Problem Child Among His 2 Companies, It Isn’t Square
headline.main: If Jack Dorsey Has a Problem Child Among His 2 Companies, It Isn’t Square

snippet: The mobile-payments company posted strong revenue growth, while Twitter, his other company, is struggling to attract new users.
abstract: Mobile-payments firm Square reports fourth-quarter loss of $80.5 million, compared with loss of $37.1 million in year-ago quarter, with revenue climbing 49 percent to $374 million; strong revenue growth makes Square less problematical for chief executive Jack Dorsey than Twitter, company he also heads.
